articles.title: Don't blindly follow rules, conflicts have human face: CJI to judges
articles.description: Judges cannot blindly apply rules as conflicts have a human face and before rendering any decision, they have to weigh socio-economic factors and the impact of their decision on the society, Chief Justice of the Supreme Court NV Ramana said on Saturday.
